name: Airpath Wireless
overview: As of January 14, 2008, Airpath Wireless, Inc. was acquired by Aptilo Networks AB. Airpath Wireless, Inc. provides OSS and clearinghouse solution for network operators, service providers, and systems integrators. Its hosted platforms deliver various tools to provide, manage, authenticate, and bill retail end-users; and to clear and settle wholesale roaming transactions. The company offers RoamBOSS Metro, a hosted broadband operational support system with roaming, wholesaling, and clearinghouse capabilities; and WiBOSS Metro, a hosted management platform for hot zones and metro-scale WLAN deployments to support large area Wi-Fi networks. It also provides WiBOSS Pro, a hosted OSS platform to help operators manage commercial, amenity-based, or closed metro networks; and WiBOSS Lite, which allows providers to enable venues to offer Wi-Fi access. In addition, the company offers InterRoam, a hosted carrier-grade platform, which enables carriers to negotiate, implement, and manage wholesale roaming agreements, as well as facilitate clearing and settlement services; and Airpath Customer Care, which assists users with identifying potential problems with network. It provides its solutions to deploy and manage metropolitan and municipal broadband wireless networks. Airpath Wireless, Inc. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Woburn, Massachusetts.
